nodes.text: The Republic Correctional Authority, abbreviated to RCA, was an organization of the Galactic Republic that was in charge of holding criminals deemed too dangerous for local law enforcement agencies or those in violation of Republic law. Staffed by agents from the Republic Security Force with special training, although during the Clone Wars against the Confederacy of Independent Systems, agents of the RCA were replaced with clone shock troopers and held prisoners of war. The Correctional Authority also maintained and operated several prisons throughout the galaxy, including prison stations located within deep space and mobile prison ships. Critics of such facilities made note of their luxurious accomodations at low-level bases as being delicate on corporate crimes.

The Republic Correctional Authority was first mentioned in the new Star Wars canon in Rise of the Separatists, a 2019 supplement to Fantasy Flight Games' series of Star Wars Roleplaying products. The Republic Correctional Authority originally appeared in the Star Wars Legends continuity in Star Wars: Bounty Hunter, a 2002 video game developed and published by LucasArts.
